verbs.description: U.S. President Donald Trump [V: was] nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize for his work in reaching an agreement to work toward de - nuclearization of the Korean peninsula .
[ARG1: U.S. President Donald Trump] was [V: nominated] [ARG2: for the Nobel Peace Prize] [ARGM-CAU: for his work in reaching an agreement to work toward de - nuclearization of the Korean peninsula] .
U.S. President Donald Trump was nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize for his work in [V: reaching] [ARG1: an agreement to work toward de - nuclearization of the Korean peninsula] .
U.S. President Donald Trump was nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize for his work in reaching an agreement to [V: work] [ARG1: toward de - nuclearization of the Korean peninsula] .
